medium: Watercolor and touches of gouache over graphite
creditline: Gift of Miss Elizabeth Huntington Moore, the artist's daughter, presented by Mrs. Frank Jewett Mather Jr.

texts.textentryhtml: Presented by Mrs. Frank Jewett Mather, Jr., as gift of Miss Elizabeth Huntington Moore, the artist’s daughter:

bibliography.boilertext: Heroic pastorals: images of the American landscape, 14 April - 6 October 2002, (Princeton, NJ: Leonard L. Milberg Gallery for the Graphic Arts, Harvey S. Firestone Library, Princeton University, 2002).
bibliography.citation: Heroic pastorals: images of the American landscape, 14 April - 6 October 2002, (Princeton, NJ: Leonard L. Milberg Gallery for the Graphic Arts, Harvey S. Firestone Library, Princeton University, 2002).

bibliography.boilertext: John Wilmerding et al., American Art in the Princeton University Art Museum: volume 1: drawings and watercolors, (Princeton: Princeton University Art Museum; New Haven, CT; London: Yale University Press, 2004)
bibliography.citation: John Wilmerding et al., American Art in the Princeton University Art Museum: volume 1: drawings and watercolors, (Princeton: Princeton University Art Museum; New Haven, CT; London: Yale University Press, 2004), p. 51, fig. 2; p. 336, checklist no. 781

bibliography.boilertext: Barbara T. Ross, American Drawings in the Art Museum, Princeton University: 130 Selected Examples (Princeton: Art Museum, Princeton University, 1976).
bibliography.citation: Barbara T. Ross, American Drawings in the Art Museum, Princeton University: 130 Selected Examples (Princeton: Art Museum, Princeton University, 1976)., p. 101, no. 100 (illus.)

bibliography.boilertext: Frank Jewett Mather, Charles Herbert Moore, landscape painter, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1957).
bibliography.citation: Frank Jewett Mather, Charles Herbert Moore, landscape painter, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1957)., pp. 46-47, 71, fig. 28

bibliography.boilertext: "Recent acquisitions," Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 15, no. 1 (1956): p. 26-27.
bibliography.citation: "Recent acquisitions," Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 15, no. 1 (1956): p. 26-27., p. 27

exhibitions.citation: American Drawings In The Art Museum, Princeton University (October 3, 1976 - November 28, 1976)
